SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inquiry WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inquiry INNER JOIN product ON inquiry.prod_id=product.prod_id INNER JOIN member ON product.member_id=member.member_id WHERE product.member_id=#{member_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchase pu INNER JOIN product pr ON pu.prod_id=pr.prod_id WHERE pr.member_id=#{member_id} AND TRUNC(pu.purc_date) = #{date, jdbcType=DATE}
SELECT SUM(pr.prod_price) FROM purchase pu INNER JOIN product pr ON pu.prod_id=pr.prod_id WHERE pr.member_id=#{member_id} AND TRUNC(pu.purc_date) = #{date, jdbcType=DATE}
SELECT * FROM product WHERE member_id=#{member_id} ORDER BY prod_date DESC

SELECT re.review_id, re.member_id, re.postdate, re.title, re.content, re.star, re.evaluation, re.review_like, re.prod_id FROM review re INNER JOIN product pr ON re.prod_id=pr.prod_id INNER JOIN member mb ON re.member_id=mb.member_id WHERE pr.member_id=#{member_id}
